title: Hero Electric partners ReadyAssist to provide service support to B2B customers
description: Commenting on the partnership, Hero Electric CEO Sohinder Gill said, "As a company, our focus has been to strengthen our after-sales services to ensure a hassle-free experience for our D2C and B2B customers. The initiative focuses on empowering and increasing awareness for EVs, further encouraging people towards cleaner mobility".
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
